typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Original Size} as string,
		{Corrected Size} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		lkp_Original_Size as string,
		lkp_Corrected_Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select Original_Size as lkp_Original_Size,\nCorrected_Size as lkp_Corrected_Size from dbo.tire_size_SCD',
	format: 'query') ~> sizetable
source1, sizetable join({Original Size} == lkp_Original_Size,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
SurrogateKey1 alterRow(insertIf({Original Size}!=lkp_Original_Size),
	updateIf({Original Size}==lkp_Original_Size)) ~> AlterRow1
Join1 keyGenerate(output(Sk_tire_size as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
AlterRow1 derive(create_date = currentDate(),
		update_date = currentTimestamp(),
		change_ind = 'Y') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Sk_Speed as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as date,
		update_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Original Size'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Original_Size = {Original Size},
		Corrected_Size = {Corrected Size},
		change_ind,
		create_date,
		update_date,
		Sk_tire_size
	),
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
